languages.text: "Это объясняет, почему чистые оттенки Сестры битвы были замутнены болотной жижей. Одна мысль о том, какие последствия имели ее деяния, приводит меня в ужас".

traits.locale_text: "Это объясняет, почему чистые оттенки Сестры Битвы были замутнены болотной жижей. Одна мысль о том, какие последствия имели ее деяния, приводит меня в ужас".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "That explains why the Sister of Battle's pure hues were muddied by swamp sludge. The mere thought of the consequences of her deeds horrifies me."
languages.original_text: "Это объясняет, почему чистые оттенки Сестры битвы были замутнены болотной жижей. Одна мысль о том, какие последствия имели ее деяния, приводит меня в ужас".

traits.locale_text: "That explains why the Sister of Battle's pure hues were muddied by swamp sludge. The mere thought of the consequences of her deeds horrifies me."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That explains why the Sister of Battle's pure hues were muddied by swamp sludge. The mere thought of the consequences of her deeds horrifies me."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “这就解释了为什么那位战斗修女纯洁的色彩会被淤泥弄得浑浊不堪。光是想到她的行为带来的后果，就让我惧怕不已。”
languages.original_text: "That explains why the Sister of Battle's pure hues were muddied by swamp sludge. The mere thought of the consequences of her deeds horrifies me."

traits.locale_text: “这就解释了为什么那位战斗修女纯洁的色彩会被淤泥弄得浑浊不堪。光是想到她的行为带来的后果，就让我惧怕不已。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "That explains why the Sister of Battle's pure hues were muddied by swamp sludge. The mere thought of the consequences of her deeds horrifies me."

languages.text: «Eso explica el cieno pantanoso que manchaba los tonos puros de la Hermana de Batalla. Solo con pensar en las consecuencias me horrorizo».
languages.original_text: "That explains why the Sister of Battle's pure hues were muddied by swamp sludge. The mere thought of the consequences of her deeds horrifies me."

traits.locale_text: «Eso explica el cieno pantanoso que manchaba los tonos puros de la Hermana de Batalla. Solo con pensar en las consecuencias me horrorizo».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「バトルシスターの純粋な色合いが泥のように濁っていたのはそのためです。彼女の行いの結末を想像するだけで、恐ろしくなります」
languages.original_text: "That explains why the Sister of Battle's pure hues were muddied by swamp sludge. The mere thought of the consequences of her deeds horrifies me."

traits.locale_text: 「バトルシスターの純粋な色合いが泥のように濁っていたのはそのためです。彼女の行いの結末を想像するだけで、恐ろしくなります」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Das erklärt, warum die reinen Farben der Schwester der Schlacht durch Sumpfschlamm getrübt wurden. Der bloße Gedanke an die Konsequenzen ihrer Taten entsetzt mich."
languages.original_text: "That explains why the Sister of Battle's pure hues were muddied by swamp sludge. The mere thought of the consequences of her deeds horrifies me."

traits.locale_text: "Das erklärt, warum die reinen Farben der Schwester der Schlacht durch Sumpfschlamm getrübt wurden. Der bloße Gedanke an die Konsequenzen ihrer Taten entsetzt mich."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Cela explique pourquoi les nuances pures de la Sœur de Bataille étaient teintées d'une vase marécageuse. Il me suffit de penser aux conséquences de ses actes pour être horrifiée. »
languages.original_text: "That explains why the Sister of Battle's pure hues were muddied by swamp sludge. The mere thought of the consequences of her deeds horrifies me."

traits.locale_text: « Cela explique pourquoi les nuances pures de la Sœur de Bataille étaient teintées d'une vase marécageuse. Il me suffit de penser aux conséquences de ses actes pour être horrifiée. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Harp Rahibesi'nin renklerindeki pak tonların neden lağım pisliğine bulandığı anlaşıldı. Yaptıklarının sonuçlarını düşününce bile dehşete düşüyorum."
languages.original_text: "That explains why the Sister of Battle's pure hues were muddied by swamp sludge. The mere thought of the consequences of her deeds horrifies me."

traits.locale_text: "Harp Rahibesi'nin renklerindeki pak tonların neden lağım pisliğine bulandığı anlaşıldı. Yaptıklarının sonuçlarını düşününce bile dehşete düşüyorum."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
